1: -module(hty_fspath_SUITE).
    2: -compile(export_all).
    3: 
    4: all() -> [
    5:     {group, move}
    6: ].
    7: 
    8: groups() -> [
    9:   {move, [
   10:     move_direct_child_file,
   11:     move_direct_child_folder,
   12:     move_nested_source
   13:   ]}
   14: ].
   15: 
   16: move_direct_child_file(Cfg) ->
   17:   test_move(Cfg, "move_direct_child_file_src", "move_direct_child_file_dst").
   18: 
   19: move_direct_child_folder(Cfg) -> 
   20:     test_move(Cfg, "move_direct_child_folder_src",  "move_direct_child_folder_dst").
   21:     
   22: move_nested_source(Cfg) -> 
   23:     test_move(Cfg, "move_nested_source_src/file2move", "move_nested_source_dst/file2move").
   24: 
   25: test_move(Cfg, From, To) ->
   26:   Filesdir = proplists:get_value(files_dir, Cfg),
   27:   From1 = Filesdir ++ From,
   28:   To1 = Filesdir ++ To,
   29:   io:format("Fromfile is [~p] and Tofile is [~p]~n", [From1, To1]),
   30:   true = filelib:is_file(From1),
   31:   false = filelib:is_file(To1),
   32:   Frompath = hty_fspath:new(From1),
   33:   Topath = hty_fspath:new(To1),
   34:   ok = hty_fspath:move(Frompath, Topath),
   35:   true = filelib:is_file(To1),
   36:   false = filelib:is_file(From1).
   37: 
   38: init_per_group(move, Config) ->
   39:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   40:     Fromdir = Datadir ++ "move/files/",
   41:     Todir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config) ++ "move/files/",
   42:     copy_fixture(Fromdir, Todir),
   43:     [{files_dir, Todir}|Config];
   44: 
   45: init_per_group(_, Cfg) -> Cfg.
   46: 
   47: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: %%% Support
   51: copy_fixture(From, To) ->
   52:     case filelib:is_dir(From) of
   53:         true ->
   54:             filelib:ensure_dir(To),
   55:             file:make_dir(To),
   56:             {ok, Filenames} = file:list_dir(From),
   57:             lists:foreach(fun(Filename) ->
   58:                 copy_fixture(From ++ "/" ++ Filename, To ++ "/" ++ Filename)
   59:             end, Filenames);
   60:         false ->
   61:             ok = filelib:ensure_dir(To),
   62:             io:format("Copying from ~s to ~s", [From, To]),
   63:             {ok, _} = file:copy(From, To)
   64:     end.
